mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, user_pw, name, phone_number, locale, nick_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_pw = #{userPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pw, name, phone_number, locale, nick_name, email) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{locale}, #{nickName}, #{email})
